metadata.description: A short identifier for your project that will be added to your resource names
Secure string for password of Dynamics365
Secure string for sasUri of MicrosoftOpenTaxiData

variables.synapseDedicatedPoolConnectionString: [concat('Integrated Security=False;Encrypt=True;Connection Timeout=30;Data Source=', 'synapse', parameters('projectShort'), uniqueString(resourceGroup().id), '.sql.azuresynapse.net;Initial Catalog=', 'sqldedicated', parameters('projectShort'))]

properties.description: Copies the parquet files from the Taxidata Microsoft open dataset to the dedicated synapse pool
Linked service for Microsoft open Datasets
Linked Service for Synapse Analytics Workspace in demo

	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	format: 'document') ~> CosmosActivitities

	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dbo.D365lead',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> SQLLeads
CosmosActivitities, SQLLeads join(regardingobjectid <=> leadid ,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'both')~> LeftJoinActivitiesLeads
LeftJoinActivitiesLeads derive(ActivityHasLead = not( isNull( leadid ) )) ~> HasLead
HasLead split(ActivityHasLead,
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitByLeads@(ActivitiesWithLead, ActivitiesWithoutLead)
SplitByLeads@ActivitiesWithLead sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		createdOn as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		modifiedOn as timestamp,
		modifiedBy as string,
		createdOnBehalfBy as string,
		modifiedOnBehalfBy as string,
		ownerId as string,
		ownerIdType as string,
		owningBusinessUnit as string,
		owningUser as string,
		owningTeam as string,
		timeZoneRuleVersionNumber as integer,
		UTCConversionTimeZoneCode as integer,
		versionNumber as long,
		activityId as string,
		activityTypeCode as string,
		isBilled as boolean,
		isRegularActivity as boolean,
		isWorkflowCreated as boolean,
		priorityCode as integer,
		priorityCode_display as string,
		regardingObjectId as string,
		regardingObjectTypeCode as string,
		scheduledEnd as timestamp,
		scheduledStart as timestamp,
		sortDate as timestamp,
		subject as string,
		scheduledDurationMinutes as integer,
		actualDurationMinutes as integer,
		actualEnd as timestamp,
		actualStart as timestamp,
		activityAdditionalParams as string,
		instanceTypeCode as integer,
		instanceTypeCode_display as string,
		isMapiPrivate as boolean,
		seriesId as string,
		sentOn as timestamp,
		senderMailboxId as string,
		deliveryPriorityCode as integer,
		deliveryPriorityCode_display as string,
		community as integer,
		community_display as string,
		leftVoiceMail as boolean,
		deliveryLastAttemptedOn as timestamp,
		exchangeItemId as string,
		exchangeWebLink as string,
		postponeActivityProcessingUntil as timestamp,
		description as string,
		stateCode as integer,
		stateCode_display as string,
		statusCode as integer,
		statusCode_display as string,
		transactionCurrencyId as string,
		exchangeRate as decimal(18,2),
		allActivityParties as string,
		traversedPath as string,
		processId as string,
		stageId as string,
		SLAId as string,
		SLAInvokedId as string,
		onHoldTime as integer,
		lastOnHoldTime as timestamp
	),
	entity: 'core/applicationCommon/Activity.cdm.json/Activity',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	folderPath: 'cdm/activities_with_leads/',
	fileSystem: 'exports',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	truncate: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CDMActivitiesWithLeads
